participant_1.background:
I am not married, but my family is very supportive of my music and writing.
I don't have a favorite holiday, but I'm looking forward to seeing my family again.
i am not going to go the extra mile anymore.
My time is more precious than my wedding ring.
i sometimes spend too much money at the casino.

participant_2.background:
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
i am an avid fan of the boston celtics.
i like to listen to rap music.
i am in grad school.
i love to bake.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing alright. Just trying to get some work done.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a writer, and I'm working on a novel.
That's really cool! I love to write, too. I'm in grad school for creative writing.
Oh, that's awesome! What are you studying?
Cool! I love poetry. I don't write it much, but I love reading it.
Me too! I'm really into rap music, and I love how poets can use the same techniques in their music.
That's a cool way to think about it. I've never really thought about rap music as poetry before.
Yeah, it's really cool! I love how it can be so expressive and emotional.
Me too! I think it's really powerful.
Yeah, it's definitely one of my favorite genres of music.
I'm glad you're so passionate about it! It's always nice to meet someone who loves the same things you do.
Me too! It's so rare to find someone who appreciates good rap music.
Well, I'm glad I could be the one to make your day!
